name: Perihelion by Guido Spannocchi - Pre Print - Dark Side of the Sun Edition - 1 of 6
description: Rare "Dark Side of the Sun" Edition of Guido Spannocchi's Perihelion Album Pre-Print. Blue, transparent vinyl. Each copy handsigned by the artist. Funds will be used for upcoming tour and album production. Only 6 transparent blue vinyl's where ever pressed. These 6 prints are handsigned "audioguido20" by the artist himself. They come in a black pre-print sleeve and are labeled "Test Pressing". Holder's can contact the artist at audioguido@gmail.com to receive their physical copy, shipped anywhere in the world.
